sn22.119:1.3: rupam ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti samanupassatha”ti?
sn22.119:1.6: Rupam, bhikkhave, ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti evametam yathabhutam sammappannaya datthabbam.
sn22.119:1.10: vinnanam ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti samanupassatha”ti?
sn22.119:1.13: Vinnanam, bhikkhave, ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti evametam yathabhutam sammappannaya datthabbam …
